section.p: You must be in one of the cities mentioned in the book below before you can use the Vade Mecum [I'm not enforcing this. Be honest --Ed]. It is a book of teleportation. You can use it to travel instantly to any one of the other cities listed.
If you don't want to use the book, or you aren't in one of the cities below, turn back to the paragraph you noted.

Every time you use the book you must .
If you fail the roll, you still travel to your destination, but the book is destroyed in the process, and you must cross it off your Adventure Sheet.
